firstTimeGreeting.content: Let’s play Audio Tennis! I'm going to hit the ball by saying words. Then you hit it back by responding correctly. Whoever gets 11 points wins the game. Sounds good?
We'll be competing, you know. So let's ask our friend Alexa to help. She's not very good at playing tennis but she's an amazing scorekeeper! What do you say, Alexa?
Of course, Ben. You and your friend can 'count' on me.
Alrighty then - let’s start with my favorite activity, called Last Letter

playerWithAwardsGreeting.content: Welcome back! Alexa, please give our friend a royal greeting!
Introducing the Master of X Perfect Games, Cliffhanger Winner, Hat Trickster, May He Live Long and Play Tennis
